scripts.db:dev:sync: npm run db:dev:push && npm run db:gen
scripts.db:dev:push: npx dotenv -e .env.dev.migrate --override -- node scripts/prisma-guard.js -- prisma db push --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:dev:reset: npx dotenv -e .env.dev.migrate --override -- node scripts/prisma-guard.js -- prisma db push --force-reset --accept-data-loss --schema=prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:dev:print-target: npx dotenv -e .env.dev.migrate --override -- node scripts/prisma-guard.js -- node scripts/print-db-target.js
scripts.db:prod:align:apply: npx dotenv -e .env.prod.migrate --override -- node scripts/prisma-guard.js -- prisma db execute --file prisma_prod_align.sql --schema=prisma/schema.prisma
